doc:
Hampton Del Ruth https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hampton_Del_Ruth 0 Hampton Del Ruth (September 7, 1879 – May 15, 1958) was an American film actor, director, screenwriter, and film producer. Among other work, he wrote the intertitles for the final American studio-made silent film Legong: Dance of the Virgins (1935). Del Ruth began working in film in 1913 and continued until the early 1930s. He also wrote at least two novels: Port o' Heart's Desire (1926) and Without Restraint (1936). He was the older brother of film director Roy Del Ruth and uncle of Cinematographer Thomas Del Ruth. Hampton_Del_Ruth ( September_7 , 1879 – May_15_,_1958 ) was an_American_film_actor , director , screenwriter , and film_producer . Among other_work , he wrote the_intertitles for the_final_American_studio-made_silent_film_Legong : Dance of the_Virgins ( 1935_) . Del_Ruth began_working in film in 1913 and continued until the_early_1930s . He also wrote at_least_two_novels : Port_o_'_Heart 's_Desire_(_1926_) and Without Restraint_(_1936_) . He was the_older_brother of film_director_Roy_Del_Ruth and uncle of Cinematographer_Thomas_Del_Ruth .
